body: Get rid of that one gang part and we have a good storyline

Just gonna assume the gang bang was a nightmare he woke up from... Cheating on him beloved wife haunted him and he will never repeat this ever again

AFTER YEARS OF SEARCHING I HAD FOUND THE HOLY MANGA
A classic. I still liked the gangbang, probably payback for the cheating. Plus Fate enjoying being humiliated is so hot, and Nanoha's cheerfulness and sluttyness is really attractive.
the gangbang part ruined it, pay with your blood!

This is good and all, but WHY THE FUCK WOULD THE DUDE LET HIS WIFE GET JIZZED ON!? I first read this a few years back, and I always find myself coming back to this,, but it’s baffling to see no one call him out for letting that happen.
:( lol the ass..... MC need to learn how to kill
